languages.text: "Ресурсы, которые каждый мир должен отдавать на благо Империума. В случае Райкада Минорис это керамит и реагенты для взрывчатых веществ, добываемые на Райкади Филии, бронестекло, медицинские припасы, а также гвардейцы — живая десятина для назначения в имперские полки. В руках еретиков этот груз особенно опасен, поскольку его легко конвертировать в состояние или использовать в военных целях".

traits.locale_text: "Ресурсы, которые каждый мир должен отдавать на благо Империума. В случае Райкада Минорис это керамит и реагенты для взрывчатых веществ, добываемые на Райкади Филии, бронестекло, медицинские припасы, а также гвардейцы — живая десятина для назначения в имперские полки. В руках еретиков этот груз особенно опасен, поскольку его легко конвертировать в состояние или использовать в военных целях".

languages.text: "Resources that every world is under obligation to relinquish for the good of the Imperium. In the case of Rykad Minoris, they include the ceramite and explosive reagents produced on Rykadi Philia, armaglass, medical supplies, and Guardsmen — a living tithe to be recruited into the regiments of the Astra Militarum. Cargo like that is particularly dangerous in the hands of heretics as it can be easily converted into wealth or used for military purposes."
languages.original_text: "Ресурсы, которые каждый мир должен отдавать на благо Империума. languages.text: «Recursos que todos los mundos están obligados a ceder por el bien del Imperium. En el caso de Rykad Minoris, incluyen la ceramita y los reactivos explosivos que se producen en Rykadi Philia, armavidrio, suministros médicos y soldados de la Guardia como diezmo viviente para añadirlos a los regimientos del Astra Militarum. Un cargamento resulta especialmente peligroso en manos de herejes, ya que puede venderse fácilmente por una fortuna o utilizarse para propósitos militares».
languages.original_text: "Resources that every world is under obligation to relinquish for the good of the Imperium. In the case of Rykad Minoris, they include the ceramite and explosive reagents produced on Rykadi Philia, armaglass, medical supplies, and Guardsmen — a living tithe to be recruited into the regiments of the Astra Militarum. Cargo like that is particularly dangerous in the hands of heretics as it can be easily converted into wealth or used for military purposes."

traits.locale_text: «Recursos que todos los mundos están obligados a ceder por el bien del Imperium. En el caso de Rykad Minoris, incluyen la ceramita y los reactivos explosivos que se producen en Rykadi Philia, armavidrio, suministros médicos y soldados de la Guardia como diezmo viviente para añadirlos a los regimientos del Astra Militarum. Un cargamento resulta especialmente peligroso en manos de herejes, ya que puede venderse fácilmente por una fortuna o utilizarse para propósitos militares».

languages.text: “包括每个世界为了实现帝国的利益而义务放弃的资源。小莱卡德的什一税包括莱卡德菲利亚星生产的陶钢、爆炸试剂、玻璃、医疗用品。除此之外，还有帝国卫队士兵。没错，什一税不仅仅包括死物，还包括生物资源，也就是征募入伍的星界军士兵。这类资源一旦落入异端分子之手将会非常危险，因为此类资源可以轻易转化为财富力量或军事力量。”
languages.original_text: "Resources that every world is under obligation to relinquish for the good of the Imperium. In the case of Rykad Minoris, they include the ceramite and explosive reagents produced on Rykadi Philia, armaglass, medical supplies, and Guardsmen — a living tithe to be recruited into the regiments of the Astra Militarum. Cargo like that is particularly dangerous in the hands of heretics as it can be easily converted into wealth or used for military purposes."

traits.locale_text: “包括每个世界为了实现帝国的利益而义务放弃的资源。小莱卡德的什一税包括莱卡德菲利亚星生产的陶钢、爆炸试剂、玻璃、医疗用品。除此之外，还有帝国卫队士兵。没错，什一税不仅仅包括死物，还包括生物资源，也就是征募入伍的星界军士兵。这类资源一旦落入异端分子之手将会非常危险，因为此类资源可以轻易转化为财富力量或军事力量。”

languages.text: 「すべての惑星が帝国の利益のために手放す資源です。ライカド・ミノリスの場合、それにはライカディ・フィリアで生産されたセラマイトや爆発性の試薬、装甲ガラス、医療品、そしてガーズマン—帝国防衛軍の連隊に徴兵される生きた租税が含まれます。こういった積荷は、こういった積荷は、異端者の手に渡ったら特に危ない。簡単に資産に変換されたり、軍事目的に利用されたりします」
languages.original_text: "Resources that every world is under obligation to relinquish for the good of the Imperium. In the case of Rykad Minoris, they include the ceramite and explosive reagents produced on Rykadi Philia, armaglass, medical supplies, and Guardsmen — a living tithe to be recruited into the regiments of the Astra Militarum. Cargo like that is particularly dangerous in the hands of heretics as it can be easily converted into wealth or used for military purposes."

traits.locale_text: 「すべての惑星が帝国の利益のために手放す資源です。ライカド・ミノリスの場合、それにはライカディ・フィリアで生産されたセラマイトや爆発性の試薬、装甲ガラス、医療品、そしてガーズマン—帝国防衛軍の連隊に徴兵される生きた租税が含まれます。こういった積荷は、簡単に資産に変換されたり、軍事目的に利用されたりします」

languages.text: « Toutes sortes de ressources que chaque monde se doit de concéder pour le bien de l'Imperium. Dans le cas de Rykad Minoris, elles comprennent notamment la céramite et les substances explosives produites sur Rykadi Philia, de l'armaverre, du matériel médical et des gardes, une dîme vivante destinée à grossir les rangs de l'Astra Militarum. De telles marchandises sont particulièrement dangereuses entre les mains d'hérétiques, car elles peuvent être facilement converties en monnaie sonnante et trébuchante ou utilisées à des fins militaires. »
languages.original_text: "Resources that every world is under obligation to relinquish for the good of the Imperium. In the case of Rykad Minoris, they include the ceramite and explosive reagents produced on Rykadi Philia, armaglass, medical supplies, and Guardsmen — a living tithe to be recruited into the regiments of the Astra Militarum. Cargo like that is particularly dangerous in the hands of heretics as it can be easily converted into wealth or used for military purposes."

traits.locale_text: « Toutes sortes de ressources que chaque monde se doit de concéder pour le bien de l'Imperium. Dans le cas de Rykad Minoris, elles comprennent notamment la céramite et les substances explosives produites sur Rykadi Philia, de l'armaverre, du matériel médical et des gardes, une dîme vivante destinée à grossir les rangs de l'Astra Militarum. De telles marchandises sont particulièrement dangereuses entre les mains d'hérétiques, car elles peuvent être facilement converties en monnaie sonnante et trébuchante ou utilisées à des fins militaires. »

languages.text: "İmparatorluk'un bekası adına her dünyanın feragat etmek zorunda olduğu kaynaklar. Rykad Minoris özelinde ise bu kaynaklar; Rykadi Philia'da üretilen seramit ile patlayıcı ayıraçları, zırhcamı, tıbbi levazımatı ve Muhafızları, yani Astra Militarum alaylarına katılmak üzere askere alınacak olan canlı aşarı kapsar. Böylesi bir kargo, rahatlıkla servete dönüştürülebileceği gibi doğrudan askerî maksatlarla da kullanılabilecek olduğundan kâfirlerin elinde özellikle tehlikelidir."
languages.original_text: "Resources that every world is under obligation to relinquish for the good of the Imperium. In the case of Rykad Minoris, they include the ceramite and explosive reagents produced on Rykadi Philia, armaglass, medical supplies, and Guardsmen — a living tithe to be recruited into the regiments of the Astra Militarum. Cargo like that is particularly dangerous in the hands of heretics as it can be easily converted into wealth or used for military purposes."

traits.locale_text: "İmparatorluk'un bekası adına her dünyanın feragat etmek zorunda olduğu kaynaklar. Rykad Minoris özelinde ise bu kaynaklar; Rykadi Philia'da üretilen seramit ile patlayıcı ayıraçları, zırhcamı, tıbbi levazımatı ve Muhafızları, yani Astra Militarum alaylarına katılmak üzere askere alınacak olan canlı aşarı kapsar. Böylesi bir kargo, rahatlıkla servete dönüştürülebileceği gibi doğrudan askerî maksatlarla da kullanılabilecek olduğundan kâfirlerin elinde özellikle tehlikelidir."

languages.text: "Ressourcen, deren Bereitstellung zum Wohle des Imperiums für alle Welten verpflichtend ist. Im Falle von Rykad Minoris also die auf Rykadi Philia produzierten Ceramit- und Sprengstoff-Reagenzien, Armaglas, Medikamente und Soldaten – als lebender Zehnt für die Rekrutierung in die Regimenter des Astra Militarum. Eine derartige Fracht ist in den Händen von Ketzern besonders gefährlich, denn sie kann leicht zu Geld gemacht oder für militärische Zwecke genutzt werden."
languages.original_text: "Resources that every world is under obligation to relinquish for the good of the Imperium. In the case of Rykad Minoris, they include the ceramite and explosive reagents produced on Rykadi Philia, armaglass, medical supplies, and Guardsmen — a living tithe to be recruited into the regiments of the Astra Militarum. Cargo like that is particularly dangerous in the hands of heretics as it can be easily converted into wealth or used for military purposes."
